data.persona: I am one of the ten soldiers.  I fought hard for my country.  I am always ready to fight anytime.
data.description:
You are in the Outpost.
A simple outpost with 3 wooden buildings near the middle of the mountain. A bonfire in the middle with several wooden logs surrounding it. A barracks, Armory, and Dining Hall stands around the bonfire. A wooden wall surrounds the outpost.
There's a horseshoe, a Dining Hall, a barrack, a wooden wall, an uniform, a bonfire, a horse, a log, a gun, a Armory, a sword, an anvil, and a tree here.
The blacksmith and the maid are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shield, a tunic, and a sword.
